description: vertical wooden structure with pieces of paper attached to outer frame of structure, with dark squiggly lines in washy black, gray and blue pigments; three separate images separated by wooden frames in top center; center and bottom; top image has a large head with high forehead, with short dark and large green eyes, surrounded by buildings along the bottom and lower right and left sides; center image has black shape in center with squiggly black lines, one extending out toward the right, and several lines extending out toward the left; gray and white smears of paint on left; 'x' and 'o' shapes in blue pigment in right; bottom image has four, oblong-shaped heads lined up next to each other, with dark, squiggly lines along the bottom; metal curing frame around three framed images; object enclosed in a black shadow box
